trans-unit.source: Represents a logical group of controls as they appear on a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 表示控件的逻辑组，因为它们显示在<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Ribbon groups resize independently of one another to layout their controls in the largest available space.
trans-unit.target: 功能区组独立于另一个布局到其调整控件的大小最大可用空间中。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether this control can be added directly to the Quick Access Toolbar.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否可以直接向快速访问工具栏添加此控件。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this control can be added directly to the Quick Access Toolbar; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果此控件可以直接添加到快速访问工具栏;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 注册的默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关什么可以影响值的详细信息，请参阅[依赖项属性值优先级](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.target: 卸载指定的项的容器。

trans-unit.target: 用来显示项的元素。

trans-unit.target: 要从显示的项<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*>集合。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*>

trans-unit.target: 返回一个新<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControl"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.target: 一个新<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControl"></xref>用于显示中的一个项的容器对象<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*>集合。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*>

trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroupSizeDefinition"></xref>功能区组的集合。

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroupSizeDefinition"></xref> objects that describe how to size controls in the group for different sizes of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 集合<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroupSizeDefinition"></xref>这些对象描述如何调整大小的不同大小的组中的控件<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup"> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup.GroupSizeDefinitions*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonGroup.GroupSizeDefinitions*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the ribbon group is collapsed.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否折叠的功能区组。

trans-unit.source: In the collapsed state, a ribbon group looks and behaves like a menu button.
trans-unit.target: 在折叠状态，功能区组的外观和行为类似于菜单按钮。

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows a ribbon with the **Clipboard**, **Paragraph**, and **Insert** groups in their collapsed state.
trans-unit.target: 下图显示了与功能区**剪贴板**，**段落**，和**插入**在其折叠状态的组。

trans-unit.source: When a group is collapsed into a menu button, its largest size variation is shown when the drop-down is opened.
trans-unit.target: 当为菜单按钮，一个组处于折叠状态时，打开下拉列表时显示其最大大小变体。

trans-unit.source: ![Ribbon with collapsed groups](~/add/media/wpfribbon-small.png "Ribbon with collapsed groups") ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ![折叠的分组与功能区](~/add/media/wpfribbon-small.png "与折叠组的功能区") # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the group is collapsed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果组处于折叠状态;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 注册的默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关什么可以影响值的详细信息，请参阅[依赖项属性值优先级](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否为组的下拉列表将处于打开状态。

trans-unit.source: In the collapsed state, a ribbon group looks and behaves like a drop-down button.
trans-unit.target: 在折叠状态，功能区组的外观和行为类似于下拉列表按钮。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the keyboard shortcut for the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置控件的键盘快捷方式。

trans-unit.source: A KeyTip must be from 1 to 3 uppercase characters, and must not contain spaces, tabs, or newline characters.
trans-unit.target: 快捷键提示必须介于 1 到 3 个大写字符，并且必须包含空格、 制表符或换行字符。

trans-unit.source: KeyTips are sometimes known as access keys or accelerators and are used as shortcut key combinations that activate controls.
trans-unit.target: 键提示有时也称为访问密钥或快捷键，可用作激活控件的快捷组合键。

trans-unit.source: KeyTips appear on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon> when you press the ALT key.
trans-unit.target: 键提示上显示<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>当你按 ALT 键。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>

trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a unique identifier that links a ribbon control to a corresponding control in the Quick Access Toolbar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the descriptive text that is displayed in the ToolTip for this control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此控件的工具提示中显示的描述性文本。

trans-unit.source: > [!WARNING] > Each ribbon control inherits a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: > [!WARNING]1> 每个功能区控件继承<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set, the ribbon’s enhanced ToolTip will not be shown; the standard ToolTip will be shown instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>设置属性，则不会显示功能区的增强工具提示; 将改为显示标准工具提示。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>
